targets.query:
from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "speed"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Geschwindigkeit"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "gust"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Böe"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "direction"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Richtung"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "speed"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 2.0}))

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "speed"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Geschwindigkeit"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "gust"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Böe"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "direction"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Richtung"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "walenstadt-wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "min_wind_speed" and r._field == "value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 100 then 0.0 else r._value * 3.6}))
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Geschwindigkeit"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "device", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "walenstadt-wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind_direction"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Richtung"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "device", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "murg" and
    r._field == "level"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Wasserstand"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "linth" and
    r._field == "temperature"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Temperatur"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
     r["_field"] == "speed" or 
     r["_field"] == "direction"
    )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"speed": "wind_speed", "direction": "wind_direction"})

from(bucket: "walenstadt-wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
     r["_measurement"] == "min_wind_speed" or 
     r["_measurement"] == "wind_direction"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"min_wind_speed": "wind_speed", "wind_direction": "wind_direction"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with 
    wind_speed: if r.wind_speed > 100 then 0.0 else r.wind_speed * 3.6}))

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "speed"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Geschwindigkeit"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "wind-alert")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "wind" and
    r._field == "gust"
  )
  |> rename(fn: (column) => 
    if "${column}" == "_value" then
      "Böhe"
    else
      "${column}"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "sensor_id"])

from(bucket: "walenstadt-wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "avg_wind_speed" or r._measurement == "min_wind_speed" or r._measurement == "max_wind_speed"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 3.6}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    max: if r.max_wind_speed > 100 then if r.avg_wind_speed > 100 then -0.1 else r.avg_wind_speed else r.max_wind_speed,
    min: if r.min_wind_speed > 100 then -0.1 else r.min_wind_speed,
    avg: if r.avg_wind_speed > 100 then -0.1 else r.avg_wind_speed
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["max_wind_speed", "min_wind_speed", "avg_wind_speed"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "max", "min", "avg"])

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "murg" and
    r._field == "level"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "linth" and
    r._field == "temperature"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: -90d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "murg" and
    r._field == "level"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "walensee")
  |> range(start: -90d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "linth" and
    r._field == "temperature"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean)
